recipesJson.name: Strawberry Never Dies (A Tribute To The Never Ending Mix)
recipesJson.author: shakenvape007
recipesJson.description: Yeah I know another freakin strawberry.  Its been a awhile since I whipped up a strawberry so what the hell.  Playing with the FA breakfast cereal in this one.  A nice strawberry milk that will keep you guessing.  Its  yummy IMO!!! . You can sub out your favorite strawberry stone if you want but Rf and inw are my favs in this one.. Its easy,  fun and vapes great. Enjoy!!!!!

reviews.text: Subbed ripe strawberry and cap sweet strawberry. Reminds me of when I was a kid and my mom would cut up strawberries and put them in cereal

pageContext.name: Strawberry Never Dies (A Tribute To The Never Ending Mix)
